monster.name: Airship (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 9 miles per hour (216 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of its elemental engine, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Airship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -20 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (air): elemental power, speed 80 ft. If the engine is destroyed, the ship immediately crashes.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2

monster.name: Galley (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Galley (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: The Galley (Unearthed Arcana) has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object, and any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if a vehicle crashes into the Galley (Unearthed Arcana).

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 2

monster.name: Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 20 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage. Keelboat (Unearthed Arcana)s typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 3

monster.name: Longship (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 5 miles per hour (120 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Longship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Rowboat (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Locomotion (water): oars, speed 15 ft. Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the Rowboat (Unearthed Arcana)'s speed is 0.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Sailing Ship (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 5 miles per hour (120 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4

monster.name: Warship (Unearthed Arcana)
monster.speed: 4 miles per hour (96 miles per day)
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
trait.text: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Warship (Unearthed Arcana) can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -10 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

trait.name: Movement:
trait.text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): oars, speed 20 ft. with 80 or more rowers, 10 feet with 40 or more rowers, 5 ft. with 20 or more rowers.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Weapons:
action.text: The Warship (Unearthed Arcana) has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if another vessel crashes into the Warship (Unearthed Arcana).

monster.description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 5
